about_the_game:
Inanimate objects such as flowers, fruits, dishes with food and drink have been depicted since Ancient Egypt and Ancient Greece. Still life portrays only everyday, ordinary things, inanimate objects. They seem to live their own quiet life, evoking memories, emotions, giving us the opportunity to admire ourselves.

Being arbitrarily, consciously composed, a still life always contains a certain, secret message. Things turn into symbols. The meanings of these symbols, the content of messages is very diverse, but most often it has world-view and even philosophical nature.

Have the pleasure of collecting all the great images from Still Life Pack #1 and unravel their message, designed to bring peace and relaxation.

Contains 18 beautiful pictures + 1 bonus picture

Contains own beautiful music - 5 instrumental compositions

Cutouts up to 1090 pieces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
